attributes.action: Let the public decide. Theresa Mays deal or no deal. End this madness now
attributes.additional_details: The government has clearly failed, we have passed our scheduled leave date, the government has failed to come up with a plan in time, there is talk of softer brexit which is not acceptable.
attributes.background: In 2016 the British public voted to leave the European Union in a fair & democratic process, the uk government has since failed to deliver that process and continues failing the British public. Give the decision to the people who decided to leave with 2 two options. Leave with May’s deal or no deal
